transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir good morning. Alok baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se kya haal chal hai? 
Customer: Badhiya. Aur bataiye sir theek thaak. Main uske liye
Executive: batana chahta tha sir jo calls wala jo cheez rehta hai na dekhiye buylead maine sara cheeze check kar liya sari ki sari bulk wali lead hi aap use kar rahe hain.
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Calls wala scenario hai na calls wala customer jo hai wo IndiaMART se puch ke call nahi karta sir. 
Customer: theek hai. 
Executive: Kyunki jaise hi usne product search kiya to uske paas uske list chali jati hai supplier ki. Jiske bihaf pe wo direct fir wo waha se aapko call laga dete hain. To usme IndiaMART ke paas koi aisa tool nahi hai ki usko kisi client ko mana kar de ki aap is supplier ko call mat karo. Kyunki wo online aapki website sari cheeze direct dikhti hai. Main samajh gaya uska ek scenario hai ki during the call agar jo aapko aisa lagta hai ki wo customer us tarike ki wo retail wale aapko wo kar rahe hain to during the call aap star ke barabar mein hash ka option aata hai hash. 
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Uske sath one press kar dena to fir wo next time ke liye us tarah ki call nahi aayegi aapke paas. 
Customer: Call chalu rehte hi ya call katne ke baad? 
Executive: Haan nahi during the call sir. Jab call chalu rahegi na. 
Customer: Call chalu hai usse baat karte karte hash aur hash aur one press kar dena haan. 
Executive: Dial kar dena hai. 
Customer: Haan haan. 
Executive: Hash one press kar dena bas wo dial karne ki zarurat nahi hash ke sath one press kar dena bas utna hi karna hai aapko. 
Customer: Achcha. 
Executive: Wo solution hai sir usme. 
Customer: Theek hai aur inquiries? 
Executive: Inquiry to automatically aa hi rahi hai sir inquiry. 
Customer: Wo bhi inquiry wo bhi bulk wali inquiry nahi uska bhi kya? 
Executive: Nahi nahi bulk wali to dekhiye inquiry ka scenario maine aapko bataya na sir. 
Customer: Wo bhi nahi hai aapke haath mein. 
Executive: Buylead ka jo team allocate karti hai inquiry wala jo scenario hai na kyunki wo dono cheeze kya hai ki customer website pe ja ke aapko inquiry dalta hai sir. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: To uska koi aisa tool nahi hai buylead ka control ek tarike se hum logo ke paas rehta hai buylead mein aapke paas jitne sare suggestion aate hain to usme se aapko pick karna padta hai. Inquiry aur jo calls ka jo rehti hai na wo kya hai ki customer ke paas jaise wo usne product search kiya aapka suggestion jata hai uske paas pura list. 
Customer: Hmm hmm. 
Executive: Theek hai uske bihaf pe wo aapki website pe jata hai website pe jane ke baad uski choice rehti hai chahe to wo aapko direct call dial kar de chahe wo as an inquiry generate kar de sir. To wo waha pe man lijiye wo 10 piece ke liye 10 plant ke liye kar raha hai ya 100 plant ke liye kar raha hai wo uski choice ke upar depend karta hai. To usme koi dikkat inquiry karte koi aapka koi point to detect hota nahi ki bhai is cheez ka aapko loss hai sir usme. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Alok ji aap isse pehle IndiaMART se pehle kahan the? 
Executive: Sir IndiaMART mein mujhe abhi 10 saal ho gaye sir. 
Customer: IndiaMART mein 10 saal ho gaye aapko? 
Executive: Haan IndiaMART mein 10 saal ho gaye sir mujhe. 
Customer: Isse pehle exporter India mein the kya? 
Executive: Nahi nahi exporter India mein nahi tha isse pehle main jo hai Idea company hai na Idea cellular limited usme tha sir. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Customer: Mujhe laga kyunki export export exporter India mein bhi maine service leke gaya tha. 
Executive: Achcha. 
Customer: Haan to mujhe aise hi laga ki Alok ji same aawaz hai na. 
Executive: Achcha nahi nahi ho sakta hai sir aawaz to bahut sare logo ki same ho sakti hai. 
Customer: Haan theek hai. To koi nahi abhi inquiries ke aap bol rahe hain calls ke aap bol rahe hain aap buylead ki baat hai buylead ke liye main thoda switch karta hu aapko call. Buyleads ko main apne hisab se consume karke after aapko call. 
Executive: Buylead to achchi aa rahi hai sir aur even even main aapko batau aapka traffic bhi bada hai sir. Us time traffic to badh gaya hai aapke paas 600000 ke kareeb hai. 
Customer: Sir traffic calls inquiry badhna theek hai business aana bahut important hota hai. Traffic nahi bhi ho business aana chahiye traffic ho business aana chahiye bas ek hi cheez hai business. Aap jis jagah pe ho adi aap sell nahi karoge aap se business nahi aayega to aap se kuch maze hi nahi aane wali cheeze baat hone wali hai. 
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai sir usme kuch nahi hai sir. 
Customer: Sabse main important baat yahi choti business. Baki aapki team achche se use kar rahi hai sir even jo calls bhi aa rahi hai na uska bhi success ratio aapka 89 90% ke kareeb chal raha hai company 80% mangti hai aapka 90% chal raha hai. To major cheez ye bhi hai ki bhai aapke paas. 
Customer: Aur sath hi sath sath hi sath kya ho raha hai rating bhi jo kar raha hai kabhi koi customer bina uske apne isse rating kar de raha hai koi 1% kar de raha hai uska kya karenge bhoge wo galat show hota hai. 
Executive: Nahi 603 customer ki rating hai sir abhi tak aapke paas total 4.7 star ki rating chal rahi hai sir. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Ye great hai main aapko batau main aapki product industry mein aur bhi mere paas hai jo leader chala rahe hain aur bhi bada packet chala rahe hain aur waha pe unke char four star tak rating nahi hai sir. Aur aapke 4.7 hai aur wo bhi 603 buyers ne aapko review kiya hai waha wo logo ne mushkil se 10 customer ne un logo ko review kiya hua hai. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Ye review ka jab jayega ki bhai kitne sare logo ne review diya uska bhi to impact padta hai na sir. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Kewal isme 6% aise customer hai jinhone one star ki rating di hai baki 78% aise customer hai jinhone five star rating diya hai isme se 603 mein se aapko. To percentage us pe wo sara ka sara sab buyer ko dikhta hai sir ki kitne logo ne kis kis hisab se rating diya hai. Ek aad jo de raha hai usko chhod dijiye usse koi fark nahi padta hai. 
Customer: Nahi to usi usi ko dekh ke to customer galat effect padta hai na dusre customer dekhte hain ki yaar inne to inko kaise one star kaise de diya. 
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu ki dikkat kya hai na jitne jab agar jo koi one star wala bhi nahi dekhega to samne wale ko samajh mein aa jayega ki ye fake reviews hai. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Kam mila jula jo cheez rehti hai na usme samne wale ko bhi samajh ki bhai har cheez har kisi ke liye to faydemand nahi ho sakti na sir market mein aap ye batao. 
Customer: Hmm hmm. 
Executive: Koi cheez aapko achchi lag rahi hai koi cheez ho sakta hai ki aapko na achchi lage par wo mujhe achchi lage sir. To wo dono cheeze hai na sir usme to wo mila jula uski baat hai. Major cheez kya hai ki bhai usme total mein se weightage mein se jo positive reviews hai unka kitna ratio hai. To wo already aapko almost 78% hai jo five star rating wale hain. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: To usse koi ek one star wale se upar to koi impact nahi aayega. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Executive: Theek hai. Baki meri planning yahi hai ki ek aad mahine aur use karo isko fir main aage leader wale mein hi main karaunga isko aage aapka theek hai. Thoda sa kyunki lead aapke product line mein achcha khasa hai count even agar jo aapki aur bhi badha di jaye to aap aaram se use kar sakte hain. 
Customer: Isme apan wo bhi kar sakte hain kya aur kuch product add kar sakte hain kya electric ke? 
Executive: Sir aise product kar sakte hain. 
Customer: Electric ke electric. 
Executive: Electric. 
Customer: Haan electric ke sir wo pura line hi change ho jayenge na sir dikkat ye hai. 
Customer: Haan kyunki mere paas mein mere paas auto parts mein accessories ke kuch parts hain to wo bhi main kaam karta hu to uska kaise hoga? 
Executive: To alag le lo na ek account. 
Customer: Achcha wo alag ek account leni padegi isme nahi hoga add. 
Executive: Alag le lo asal mein kya hai na is wale mein main man lijiye product dalwa bhi du na to usse mismatch itna ho jayega na to iska aayega sahi tarike se na uska aayega sahi tarike se. Kyunki wo SEO pura ka pura ek category ka impact kar jata hai na sir. Wo dono hi line alag hai sir. 
Customer: Achcha. 
Executive: Dikkat ye hai. Nahi to mere ko to koi dikkat nahi sir. 
Customer: Mere paas ek purani service ek purani service mere paas padi hui hai. Usme achche khase review calls aur sab kuch pade hue hain wo. Koi GST hai aapke paas iske alawa aur koi GST main lene wala hu abhi. GST le lo us pe main register karwa dunga aapko fir us electronic wale. Uska jo jo aap bata rahe hain na vehicle accessories wagera ka inka inka to achcha khasa market hai sir online mein bahut badhiya market hai inka. 
Customer: Hmm. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai okay. 
Executive: Le lo aap ek baar GST theek hai uske baad bata dena main karwa deta hu sir isse theek hai. Theek hai wo close kar deta hu sir feedback de dena sir theek hai. 
Customer: Okay thank you sir. 
Executive: Okay thank you thank you so much sir thanks sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer concerned about retail inquiries.

- Customer wants to add electric products.

- Customer concerned about negative ratings.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested blocking retail customers during call.

- Executive advised separate account for electric products.

- Executive explained the impact of positive reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to obtain GST and inform the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, ratings, gst, product category
